title: TorontoJS Code Buddy Club on Discord(online)
details:
Details
-------

\## What is a Code Buddy Club

*   It's similar to a book club but uses free courses and tutorials instead of books
*   Participants are free to code independently, or to pair program.
*   Meet on discord to share progress, provide support, and help with debugging
*   Each course should take roughly 1 - 8 weeks to complete
*   It's a really relaxed, supportive, and social atmosphere.

\## 2024 Courses List and Schedule

*   Date: Sunday, January 21th.
*   Time: 11:00 am-12:00pm
*   Location: TorontoJS Discord on the Code Buddy Channel [https://discord.com/channels/1078763949132107926/1183920018799472784](https://discord.com/channels/1078763949132107926/1183920018799472784)
*   \*\* Contact us on Slack if you need a Discord Invite! [https://join.slack.com/t/torontojs/shared\_invite/zt-zgi31snl-omO3tXSZ0Q7zqN9WBQSf8Q](https://join.slack.com/t/torontojs/shared_invite/zt-zgi31snl-omO3tXSZ0Q7zqN9WBQSf8Q)

\### Regular meetings

*   Sundays 11am-12pm
*   Tuesdays 6:30pm-7:30pm

**Courses for the First Week** (January 15th to January 21st)

*   **GitHub Tips & Tricks**
*   [https://egghead.io/courses/github-tips-tricks-6fc4](https://egghead.io/courses/github-tips-tricks-6fc4)
*   **Build faster with GitHub Copilot and Codespaces**
*   [https://youtu.be/Lseaqxg8NaY?si=qblR8Am2hJlhcn0Q](https://youtu.be/Lseaqxg8NaY?si=qblR8Am2hJlhcn0Q)
